column1: Sir '''Antony Sher''' [[Order of the British Empire
column2: KBE]] (born 14 June 1949) is a South African-born English actor, writer and theatre director who portrayed [[Thráin]] in the [[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug (extended edition)
column3: Extended Edition]] of ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]''.
